timeout.description:
Overall timeout for executing all the operations. This timeout should equal or exceed the total
timeout for each operation listed.

abatement.description: Whether an abatement event message will be expected for the control loop from DCAE.

trigger.description: Initial operation to execute upon receiving an Onset event message for the Control Loop.

operations.description: List of operations to be performed when Control Loop is triggered.

items.title: onap.datatype.controlloop.Operation
items.description: An operation supported by an actor

description.description: A user-friendly description of the intent for the operation

operation.description: The operation the actor is performing.

target.title: onap.datatype.controlloop.Target
target.description: Definition for a entity in A&AI to perform a control loop operation on

entityIds.description:
Map of values that identify the resource. If none are provided, it is assumed that the
entity that generated the ONSET event will be the target.

payload.description: Name/value pairs of payload information passed by Policy to the actor

timeout.description: The amount of time for the actor to perform the operation.

retries.description: The number of retries the actor should attempt to perform the operation.

success.description: Points to the operation to invoke on success. A value of "final_success" indicates and end to the operation.

failure.description: Points to the operation to invoke on Actor operation failure.

failure_timeout.description: Points to the operation to invoke when the time out for the operation occurs.

failure_retries.description: Points to the operation to invoke when the current operation has exceeded its max retries.

failure_exception.description: Points to the operation to invoke when the current operation causes an exception.

failure_guard.description: Points to the operation to invoke when the current operation is blocked due to guard policy enforcement.

engineServiceParameters.description: The engine parameters like name, instanceCount, policy implementation, parameters etc.

javaProperties.description: Name/value pairs of properties to be set for APEX if needed.
